LanguageData.ROMVC_Slider_CaitiffXPTooltip: This setting determines how much XP members of Caitiff bloodlines receive when feeding.
LanguageData.ROMVC_GameMode_DefaultDesc: Caitiff vampires will receive 5 XP point each time they feed, which is a third of that received by clan vampires.
LanguageData.ROMVC_GameMode_CustomDesc: Change the amount of XP that Caitiff vampires receive.
LanguageData.ROMVC_VampireSettingsUnavailable: Caitiff settings currently unavailable.\n\nPlease start a new game or load a game to edit caitiff settings.
